title: Siegel Rewards Program, Bad Credit Ok, Unfurnished apartments
posting_body: ['Twain Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-No long term lease required', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-On Las Vegas RTC bus line', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Easy freeway access', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Bad Credit Ok', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
